Text: Collection of data about you comes from multiple sources and methods. Data is collected for purposes including but not limited to analytics, behavioral and targeted advertising, retargeting, audience segmentation, and audience modeling.\n\nIn addition, our web server automatically recognizes every visitor’s IP address. We do not, however, recognize email addresses unless they are provided to us by filling out a form on our website. We collect email addresses of those who contact us by email or provide their email address in some other method voluntarily. We also collect (email and postal) addresses and fax and telephone numbers submitted on our website to promote our products and services and provide updates. In addition, we collect aggregate information regarding visitors to our site and the specific pages viewed. We do this for the sole purpose of improving our website. Also, we do not share our collected information with outside companies or set cookies or employ the services of ad server companies.  Personal information collected from our clients’ customers is used only as directed by the client. It will not be used for any other purpose without authorization from the individual and/or client.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Also, we do not share our collected information with outside companies or set cookies or employ the services of ad server companies.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: We may receive information about you, including but not limited to your IP address, browser type, e-mail address, first name, last name, company name, mailing address, ip address, mobileID, cookie and fax and telephone number(s), from third party marketing partners that provide us with consumer and business data to manage on their behalf. We may share, license or sell your information to third parties for various marketing purposes, including online (e.g., e-mail marketing and digital targeting/re-targeting) and offline (e.g., direct mail and telemarketing) marketing programs.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
Privacy Statement
What We Collect
Collection of data about you comes from multiple sources and methods. Data is collected for purposes including but not limited to analytics, behavioral and targeted advertising, retargeting, audience segmentation, and audience modeling.

In addition, our web server automatically recognizes every visitor’s IP address. We do not, however, recognize email addresses unless they are provided to us by filling out a form on our website. We collect email addresses of those who contact us by email or provide their email address in some other method voluntarily. We also collect (email and postal) addresses and fax and telephone numbers submitted on our website to promote our products and services and provide updates. In addition, we collect aggregate information regarding visitors to our site and the specific pages viewed. We do this for the sole purpose of improving our website.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Also, we do not share our collected information with outside companies or set cookies or employ the services of ad server companies
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Personal information collected from our clients’ customers is used only as directed by the client. It will not be used for any other purpose without authorization from the individual and/or client.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Marketing Partners\nWe may receive information about you, including but not limited to your IP address, browser type, e-mail address, first name, last name, company name, mailing address, ip address, mobileID, cookie and fax and telephone number(s), from third party marketing partners that provide us with consumer and business data to manage on their behalf. We may share, license or sell your information to third parties for various marketing purposes, including online (e.g., e-mail marketing and digital targeting/re-targeting) and offline (e.g., direct mail and telemarketing) marketing programs.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Who We Share It With:\nExcept as may be required by law, any personal information we obtain from individuals will only be used to contact you in response to your inquiry, or as directed by our clients in accordance with their privacy policy. The personal information collected by Lighthouse List Company, for its own use, will not be sold, transferred or traded to any third party for unsolicited marketing purposes. However, we may share some of your business information with our partners with which we share an arrangement for co-marketing of services. Customer personal information collected on behalf of our clients will only be disclosed as directed by the client in accordance with their privacy policy.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Who We Share It With:\nExcept as may be required by law, any personal information we obtain from individuals will only be used to contact you in response to your inquiry, or as directed by our clients in accordance with their privacy policy. Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: Additionally, Lighthouse List Company acts as a processor on behalf of its clients and partners, providing customized services that enable organizations to manage their customer information efficiently in such ways as increasing marketing efficiency, and applying database marketing strategies. Lighthouse List Company processes marketing information of its clients and on behalf of its clients including name, postal address, phone number, email address, ip address, mobileID and cookie. In this capacity as a processor on behalf, Lighthouse List Company acts on the instructions of its clients and does not control or share such data without direction from the clients or partners.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
Types of Cookie
Below explains the types of cookies we use on our websites and why we use them:

Required Cookies

These cookies are essential for our website and services to perform basic functions and are necessary for us to operate certain features. These include those required to ensure our services are operating properly.

Analytics and Performance

These cookies allow us to optimize performance by collecting information on how users interact with our websites, including which pages are visited most, as well as other analytical data. We use these details to improve how our websites function and to understand how users interact with them.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Cookie Policy\nCookies are small text files that the websites visited by a user send directly to its terminal (usually, to the browser), where they are memorised to be transmitted to the same websites at the following visit by the same user (the so-called first party cookies). During the web surfing of a website, a user may receive on its terminal also cookies of other websites or of other web servers (the so-called third party cookies); this happens because there may be elements on the visited website, such as images, maps, sounds, links to specific web pages of other domains that are on servers other than the server on which the requested page is placed.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: When you opt out, we will place an opt out cookie on your computer. This cookie tells us not to collect your information.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected
